page.title: 01OUR BLOCK 04321167 BRAE
page.content: The land in our area is mainly moorland.There are many small lochs amongst the hills.Streams flow from the high land down to the sea.In winter the land is very wet. In the eastern half of our grid two Voes or inlets dominate the area.The one to the south is Busta Voe.Sometimes in winter boats seek shelter here from westerly gales.To the north is the famous Sullom Voe.Not to far north of our grid on the shores of the voe stands Europes largest Oil Terminal.In the western half of our grid the Atlantic Ocean crashes into rocky shores. The nearby Terminal has left its mark on the grid,oil pollution booms are stationed in the voe,half of ahillside has been removed for stones to help in the building of the Terminal.
